## Purpose

To supply a list of types for Final Products.

## Columns

| column name | data type | constraints | purpose |
|:------------|:----------|:------------|:--------|
| code | varchar(20) | Primary Key, Not Null | To be the primary key for other tables to reference |
| product_name | varchar(50) | Not Null | To hold the full name of the final product type |
| product_type | varchar(20) | Not Null | "Liquid" or "Dry" |
| default_volume | integer | Not Null | The qty that should autopopulate in the application when creating a new final product batch |
| current_version | varchar(20) | Not Null | - |
